mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA ( ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , CRT_DATE , MDF_DATE , FILE_NAME , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , ISSECRETE , SECRETE_POST_PASSWORD , EMAIL ) VALUES ( 'QN-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') || '-' || LPAD(QNA_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{subject} , #{content} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , '' , '' , 'N' , '' , #{email} )
mapper.select: SELECT Q.ID , Q.SUBJECT , Q.CONTENT , Q.CRT_DATE , Q.MDF_DATE , Q.FILE_NAME , Q.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , Q.EMAIL Q_EMAIL , M.EMAIL , M.NAME , M.LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , M.LATEST_LOGIN , M.AUTHORITY FROM QNA Q , MEMBERS M WHERE Q.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND Q.ID = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM QNA Q , MEMBERS M WHERE Q.EMAIL = M.EMAIL
AND SUBJECT LIKE '%' || '${searchKeyword}' || '%'
